name: Throwaway Game
description:
Throwaway Gmae - a game where you throw objects away. You're a super tough guy who can pickup and throw everything in incredibly strength, and nearly everything moveable can be thrown, and most of that can be used as weapons. You can smash your enemy to the ground, smash your enemy to your enemy, and smash weapons to your enemy. And when you have smashed them all, you'll have more to smash.

出手游戏 - 一个你把各种东西从手中丢出去的游戏。你是一个超级强壮的壮汉，能够把任何东西举起并用惊人的力量扔出去，基本上所有能动的东西都能扔，并且大部分都能被当作武器。你可以把你的敌人砸到地上，把你的敌人砸到你的敌人身上，或是把各种武器砸向你的敌人。当你把他们都砸死之后，你就能有更多可砸的东西了。
